author: Luis A. Cruz
subject: Ha!  Found the article...
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Posted for your approval:

=== Begin article ===
stanlee wrote in message ...
>On Thu, 11 Mar 1999, Demian Phillips wrote:
                     
<Snip>
                     
>> original Arsne Lupan (sp from french and I don't speak it) stories
>> and the anime versions I have seen does do justice to the name. 
>>
>
>I heard a long while back (forgot where exactly) that
>that is not the case, in the opinions of
>those people who owns the rights to the name.
                     
Actually, didn't Leblanc's copyright on the name run out recently?
Isn't that why LIII can be called 'Lupin' now, rather than Rupan or
The Wolf? 
                     
- --
James 'Tengu' King -The Magpie of Millennial Madness
=== End article ===

Never found solid evidence of this fact anywhere else, but I don't
know how to
go about finding out about international copyright holdings.

- ---
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
